column4: can anyone help me with my X and beryl? nobody is talking in #beryl
what about #ubuntu-effects?
nobody talkin in there
how are things messed up?
how did you start beryl? with a custom session script?
how about starting it with gnome-session? (WAG: you're using KDE)
http://pastebin.ca/399775
on this site, your same arguments to Xsession is used with exec http://wiki.beryl-project.org/wiki/Install_Beryl_on_Ubuntu_Edgy_with_XGL
and on this one xession is used only with gnome-session as argument http://wiki.beryl-project.org/wiki/Install_Beryl_on_Ubuntu_Dapper_with_XGL
try removing "dbus-launch --exit-withsession" part
i'm on nvidia, not xgl, can't test that out
have you start beryl-manager?
rightclick the beryl icon and see what's selected in "window manager"
select Beryl there
for academic purpose, try replace "Xsession gnome-session" with "dbus-launch --exit-with-session gnome-session" :)
i can;t test it (nvidia card), just curious out of academic sense
you know, many ways to do one thing
ok, just skip that, start customising your experience!! :D
wierd, last time i use emerald, just clicking on one applies it instantly
you can select GTK window decorator
back to orange :)
left a message on #beryl and someone will get attention, i'm not sure that's the way it works
yesterday lupine_85 was really helpful for me on #beryl
